Reviews.Title: Great  bundle
Reviews.Author: Timothy Hamade
Reviews.Content: Great digital SLR package. I leaned photography using a Nikon F series. this camera bundle is lighter (plastic) and more compact. But still gives me a excellent shooting platform. The picture quality is impressive. A nondescript camera bag is a plus, as are the UV filters and 32gb SDHC card. Included screen protectors are more generic than I hoped for. Cameta Camera, thus far, has excellent customer service, Purchase was expedient, delivery was a couple of days before the stated date, though shipping was by train across country (I assume), one dent in outer package, but no noted damage with the factory package. Second thoughts would have me put more money into my bundle for a 70-300mm zoom, but the 55-200mm will meet most of my needs. I will recommend this seller.
